title: The death recap doesnt show the actual damage dealt to you...

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Clearly in this death recap i did not die by these two champions but some how they did extra damage to me without using their skills or auto attacks and of course riot wont fix this.

replies.body: The whole Death Recap system is up for a complete tear-down and remake. There's a decent chance it will take a higher priority after the Client Update is done and out of the way.
been a problem since it first came out. its always been way wrong
